summary: This document is a suicide watch observation log for an inmate, likely Jeffrey Epstein, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It begins on July 23, 2019, and contains detailed 15-minute interval observations of the inmate's behavior, including sleeping, talking, and pacing in their cell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: A suicide watch was initiated for an inmate, strongly indicated to be Jeffrey Epstein, on July 23, 2019.
The inmate's register number follows the pattern associated with Epstein (76318-054), though partially redacted.
The log contains detailed 15-minute observations of the inmate's behavior, including sleeping, lying on the bed, talking, and pacing at the cell door.
The document is a standard institutional suicide watch observation log, indicating formal monitoring procedures were in place.
The location is specified as the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
